name: Smith's Bizarre Dating Sim
description:
Take control of Smith McCool as you go out meeting wonderful people and eventually date them! From a lovable (And kind of clingy) pyromaniac, an adorable blue alien and in future builds many more cuties to open your heart too and romance! Now on MAC And PC!

(Warning. I am new to game development and this project is community created. Please keep in mind there are place holders and other stuff. I am not expecting this game to get popular but it is here for people to download.)

 This project is the love child of a bad ass Jojo parody of Garfield! This is a community project from a  fun discord and its posted here for people to easily download and play. If you don't know what Garfeilf is Unbreakable or Smith's Bizarre Mission is I suggest you watch them on YouTube. Then you will understand the story.
